sentences.text: using graphics_qt_qpainter_plugin ends up with undefined symbol _ZTV14EmbeddedWidget
I think, we have to include "graphics_qt_qpainter.h" into RenderArea.h.
Versions of packages navit-graphics-qt-qpainter depends on:
> using graphics_qt_qpainter_plugin ends up with undefined symbol > _ZTV14EmbeddedWidget
> I think, we have to include "graphics_qt_qpainter.h" into RenderArea.h.
Will have a look at this.
>> using graphics_qt_qpainter_plugin ends up with undefined symbol >> _ZTV14EmbeddedWidget
>> I think, we have to include "graphics_qt_qpainter.h" into RenderArea.h.
> Will have a look at this.
This is upstream ticket 961 opened three months ago.
Bug #658899 reported by you has been fixed in the Git repository.
You can see the changelog below, and you can check the diff of the fix at:
Fix missing symbol in plugin graphics-qt-qpainter
+    + Footway names visible and searcheable in Town submenu
+    + Debugging examples added to the default navit.xml
> >> using graphics_qt_qpainter_plugin ends up with undefined symbol > >> _ZTV14EmbeddedWidget
> >> I think, we have to include "graphics_qt_qpainter.h" into RenderArea.h.
> > Will have a look at this.
> This is upstream ticket 961 opened three months ago.
Btw, i attached a patch which adds support for landuse=meadow to maps.
We believe that the bug you reported is fixed in the latest version of navit, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:
A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is attached.
Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.
If you have further comments please address them to 658899@bugs.debian.org, and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.
Gilles Filippini <pini@debian.org> (supplier of updated navit package)
(This message was generated automatically at their request;
if you believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive administrators by mailing ftpmaster@debian.org)
Binary: navit navit-gui-gtk navit-gui-internal navit-graphics-gtk-drawing-area navit-graphics-qt-qpainter navit-data maptool
maptool    - Converts OpenStreetMap maps to Navit
navit      - Car navigation system with routing engine
navit-data - Car navigation system with routing engine - data files  navit-graphics-gtk-drawing-area - Car navigation system with routing engine - GTK+ graphic plugin
navit-graphics-qt-qpainter - Car navigation system with routing engine - Qt graphic plugin
navit-gui-gtk - Car navigation system with routing engine - GTK+ GUI
navit-gui-internal - Car navigation system with routing engine - internal GUI Closes: 658899
+ Footway names visible and searcheable in Town submenu
Made tables scrollable by dragging lines vertically        .
Paging of table widgets with gesture left-to-right and right-to-left        .
+ vehicle_file: option to save current gps position on shutdown and        resume from there on startup
+ Debugging examples added to the default navit.xml
+ Update debian/copyright to version 1.0 of the Machine-readable
